Plot: A guy who moves back to Portland, Oregon becomes involved in the mystery of his ex-girlfriend's disappearance.
Title: Cold Weather
Writer: Aaron Katz (story), Brendan McFadden (story), Ben Stambler (story), Aaron Katz
Actors: Cris Lankenau, Trieste Kelly Dunn, Raúl Castillo, Robyn Rikoon
tomatoConsensus: For viewers who manage to stay invested in its occasionally aimless story, Cold Weather proves a surprisingly sophisticated blend of mumblecore and indie noir.
